headline.main: Diet and Health: Old Lesson in New Detail

byline.original: By MARIAN BURROS, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After the most comprehensive review to date involving findings on nutrition and health, the National Research Council recommended today that Americans eat less salt, fat and cholesterol to avoid a wide range of chronic diseases.
docs.snippet: LEAD: After the most comprehensive review to date involving findings on nutrition and health, the National Research Council recommended today that Americans eat less salt, fat and cholesterol to avoid a wide range of chronic diseases.
